text: Golam Mostofa (Bengali: গোলাম মোস্তফা) (1897- 13 October 1964) was a writer and poet. Mostofa wrote the Tarana-E-Pakistan the anthem (official song) for the then country of East Pakistan. His country is now called Bangladesh. Category:1897 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Pakistani poets
title: Golam Mostofa (poet)
